participant_1.background:
I ride my bicycle to work.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions.
i hate skiing.
my favorite band is worn.

participant_2.background:
I used to play softball until my health prevented me from doing so.
My pets are all rescues and they have brought so much joy into my life.
i own a french bulldog.
i like the taste of cheese.
I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Not bad, just got home from work. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse, but I used to play softball until I got injured.
Oh, that's too bad! What kind of pets do you have?
I have a French bulldog and a cat. They're both rescues and I love them to pieces.
Aw, that's so sweet! I have a cat too. She's a bit of a diva, but I love her nonetheless.
I love cats! They're so independent and adorable.
What are your favorite things to do?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read too. What's your favorite book?
I have so many favorites, but I'd have to say The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald is one of my top picks.
Oh, that's a great book! I love the way he writes.
Me too! He's such a talented writer.
I'm glad we have the same taste in books.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do
